settings.title: Sustainability
settings.subtitle: We are committed to leading meaningful positive change, investing in our diverse global community and responding to environmental challenges through innovation and collaboration.
Our goal is to achieve 75% sustainable materials usage by 2025.
In 2026, we plan to hit 80% in the use of eco-friendly materials.
By 2027, we aspire to achieve 85% recyclable materials in our products.
We strive to achieve 90% carbon-neutral materials usage by 2028.

settings.title: BLAZING A TRAIL IN FASHION
settings.content:
Bdraddy is at the forefront of sustainable fashion, recognized for our pioneering upcycling techniques. We proudly made the shortlist for the BFC/Vogue Designer Fashion Fund in both 2021 and 2022, and we were thrilled to receive the BFC Fashion Trust Fund in those years as well.

In March 2022, our founder Anna received Innovate UK’s Women in Innovation Award, a program aimed at empowering visionary women to achieve their business goals and foster change through innovative ideas, while also promoting gender diversity in the UK’s innovation sector. Anna's innovative proposal for a comprehensive textile sorting and regeneration system has been hailed as a potential solution to the UK's textile waste crisis. We are dedicated to closing the loop on cotton production by reclaiming materials and ensuring that the UK does not export, degrade, or send to landfill any materials that could be reused.

settings.title: How bdraddy Leading the way in fashion with sustainability in mind
settings.content_1: Bdraddy is leading the charge in sustainable fashion, bringing fresh and innovative upcycling techniques that are changing the game. We were super excited to be shortlisted for the renowned BFC/Vogue Designer Fashion Fund in both 2021 and 2022!
settings.content_2: Plus, we’re really proud to have snagged the BFC Fashion Trust Fund during those years too, which just goes to show our dedication to eco-friendly practices and creativity in the fashion world. It’s all about making a positive impact while looking good!
